TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit TableLayoutSettings extends System.Windows.Forms.LayoutSettings implements class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable
Public NotInheritable Class TableLayoutSettings Inherits LayoutSettings Implements ISerializable
public ref class TableLayoutSettings sealed : System::Windows::Forms::LayoutSettings, System::Runtime::Serialization::ISerializable
type TableLayoutSettings = class inherit LayoutSettings interface ISerializable

summary.span: 收集与表布局关联的特性。

span.span: Collects the characteristics associated with table layouts.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类收集和管理与表布局方案相关联的特性。The class collects and manages the characteristics associated with the table layout scheme. 此类在内部使用和类，以及表布局引擎。This class is used internally by the and classes, as well as the table layout engine. 类由布局引擎用来确定如何设置容器的子控件布局。The class is used by the layout engine to determine how to lay out the container's child controls. 类管理以下信息：The class manages the following information: - 正在使用。The being used. - 在布局中的行和列的最大数目。The maximum number of columns and rows in the layout. - 用包含的列和行样式的集合。The collection of styles used for the contained columns and rows. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何初始化对象控件。The following example shows how to initialize a object for a control. 完整代码列表，请参阅[如何： 实现自定义 ToolStripRenderer](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-implement-a-custom-toolstriprenderer.md)。For a full code listing, see [How to: Implement a Custom ToolStripRenderer](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-implement-a-custom-toolstriprenderer.md). [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.GridStrip#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.GridStrip/CS/GridStrip.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.GridStrip#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.GridStrip/VB/GridStrip.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int ColumnCount { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.ColumnCount : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置表布局中允许的最大列数。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum number of columns allowed in the table layout.

value.span: 表布局中允许的最大列数。

span.span: The maximum number of columns allowed in the table layout.
The default is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置属性不会分配的列或预留任何内存。Setting the property does not allocate the columns or any backing memory. 创建列时，会发生这种分配。This allocation occurs when the columns are created. 设置此属性会导致表进行布局的另一个操作。Setting this property causes the table to undergo another layout operation. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何初始化对象控件。The following example shows how to initialize a object for a control. 完整代码列表，请参阅[如何： 实现自定义 ToolStripRenderer](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-implement-a-custom-toolstriprenderer.md)。For a full code listing, see [How to: Implement a Custom ToolStripRenderer](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-implement-a-custom-toolstriprenderer.md). [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.GridStrip#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.GridStrip/CS/GridStrip.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.GridStrip#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.GridStrip/VB/GridStrip.vb#2)]

span.span: The property value is less than 0.

summary.span: 获取用于确定表布局列的外观的样式集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of styles used to determine the look and feel of the table layout columns.

value.span: 一个包含布局表的列样式的 。

span.span: A that contains the column styles for the layout table.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来访问特定列的样式属性。Use the property to access the style properties of specific columns. 中的样式的顺序匹配布局表中的相应列的顺序。The order of the styles in a matches the order of the corresponding columns in the layout table.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示当所有的现有单元格都被占用时，应如何扩展表布局以容纳新的单元格。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating how the table layout should expand to accommodate new cells when all existing cells are occupied.
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性确定如何布局引擎应将新的单元格添加到一个完整的表。The property determines how the layout engine should add a new cell to a full table. 此属性可以设置为以指示是否应添加行，请以指示应添加列，或若要禁用扩展。This property can be set to to indicate that rows should be added, to indicate that columns should be added, or to disallow expansion.

exception.span: 该属性值对于枚举类型无效。

span.span: The property value is not valid for the enumeration type.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property LayoutEngine As LayoutEngine

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

span.span: Gets the current table layout engine.
The currently being used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性一般用于在两个上下文中：The property is typically used in two contexts: - 使用表布局的容器。A container that uses a table layout. - 包含在表布局容器，如按钮的单元格中包含的控件。A control contained within a table layout container, such as a button contained in a cell of a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置属性不会分配任何备份内存或行。Setting the property does not allocate the rows or any backing memory. 创建行时，会发生这种分配。This allocation occurs when the rows are created. 设置此属性会导致表进行布局的另一个操作。Setting this property causes the table to undergo another layout operation. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何初始化对象控件。The following example shows how to initialize a object for a control. 完整代码列表，请参阅[如何： 实现自定义 ToolStripRenderer](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-implement-a-custom-toolstriprenderer.md)。For a full code listing, see [How to: Implement a Custom ToolStripRenderer](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-implement-a-custom-toolstriprenderer.md).
